item.description:
Have even more fun between Christmas and New Years!  If you have family in town, bring them with you; plenty of space!

Bring an appetizer, beverage of your choice, $1 for meetup webpage fees, and your favorite games!

Please be sure to park in spots labeled "Visitor" only. Directions will be emailed the Friday before meetup. This event is on the Manchester/South Windsor line.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Game Night at the Clubhouse
